{{Change History/Header}}
[[Version 5.2]]
* Added "Recollections" feature to certain [[World Quest]]s.
----
[[Version 5.0]]
* Added [[Tribal Chronicle]]s to [[Story Quest]]s.
* Added "Quick Start" to new [[Archon Quest]]s.
* Added "Long Quest Prompt Function" for quests with longer durations and high difficulty.
* Changed the icon shown next to quest steps in the quest menu from an arrow to a diamond.<!-- file: [[File:Icon Quest Step.png|20px|link=]] -->
----
[[Version 4.8]]
* Added "Dialogue Review" and "Hide Dialogue" features.
----
[[Version 4.6]]
* Added "Focused Experience Mode" for certain quests to prevent [[character]]s or scenes from being occupied by other quests.
----
[[Version 4.5]]
* Added the function to skip dialogue that has been completed in [[Hangout Event]]s.
----
[[Version 4.3]]
* Added new icons for markers when entering and exiting locations.
----
[[Version 4.1]]
* Added "Involvement in Other Quests" screen to continue or suspend quests that will cause other quests to become occupied.
* Added "Stage Objective" screen to display quest stage objectives in certain quests to advance the story. Accessed by holding "Quest Navigation" key and may also be viewed from the [[Quest/Menu|quest menu]].
----
[[Version 3.2]]
* Added "Story Reviews" when the player returns after leaving the game during certain parts of specific quests.
----
[[Version 2.8]]
* Added Quests Messages with "Click to continue" option instead of autoplay.
----
[[Version 2.6]]
* Added "Quick Start" to certain [[Event Quest]]s.
----
[[Version 1.4]]
* Added [[Hangout Event]]s to Story Quests.
----
[[Version 1.0]]
* Quests were released with [[Archon Quest]]s, [[Story Quest]]s, [[World Quest]]s, and [[Commission]]s.
